message: We'd be ecstatic if Convore hit that :)
@ericflo it would be cool if convore became the HN chat. i wonder if PG would put links to convore chats on each submission or something
i would stop using hacker news if it stooped such crass commercialism
@orph quit now then, have you ever looked at the botoom of the HN pages?
what, the logos or apply link? those don't bother me too much.
@orph, yes I believe that's all that @tom is proposing
Although I do notice those links aren't on post pages
@yetanotheraccount Image if all story could link to a topic here. No need to refresh anymore
I'm afraid that this number might be a bit misleading.. I refresh stories I'm interested in somewhere around 10^4 times.  :-)
I actually enjoy the conversation staying on hacker news itself. But for side-conversations, I think it may be nice to have stuff here as well.

@davidwparker I agree that serious conversation fits there well.  This might work for catching the snark and less considered opining.  In keeping with that story earlier today... here is where you post an idea and it can have less weight if it fails.
